data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hormozgan, Iran so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hormozgan, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Hormozgan you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Hormozgan to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: There are 1,776,400 people living in the state of Hormozgan. Only about 9,254 might be believers.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken people.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 9,254 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Hormozgan, Iran to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hormozgan, Iran has a population of 1,776,400.

We estimate Hormozgan has 9,254 people who might know Jesus, 23,988 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,743,158 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Hormozgan.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Hormozgan
location.cities_list: Bandar Abbas, Mīnāb, Qeshm, Bandar-e Lengeh, Kīsh
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bandar Abbas (352,173), Mīnāb (70,790), Qeshm (25,000), Bandar-e Lengeh (22,768), Kīsh (20,922)
